extendedInfo.description: Save the earth from the asteroid rain in an innovative Tower Defense approach. Equip your space station with blaster, laser, solar panel, shield, and freeze cannons. Defense is very important, so protect your command center and let it blast away all incoming asteroid waves.Beat the best players and put your name on the Leaderboard! We currently use Beintoo, so you can get rewards from your achievements in the game. Be part of the player community and challenge your friends. It's addicting to build the best earth defense!Features: + FREE GAME from gamers to gamers+ Infinite mode gameplay+ Highscores+ Load saved game+ Fun and challengingIf you are having problems with the game not running on your device, send us an e-mail so we can find a solution:feedback@deonn.comWe're also on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Deonn-Game-Studios/179547855440258

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Probably one of the most addictive games I\'ve played. The only down side is it drains my batteries very fast but overall a great game!
reviews.author: Matt Keely

reviews.title: UNDOUBTEDLY ADDICTIVE!
reviews.comment: Long time player of this game and every time I come back to it I find myself playing for days on in! Very entertaining and gets your creative juices flowing. Please please please update to more levels, bosses and weapons - it will sure as hell make this game even more addictive and compelling!
reviews.author: KAY ZEE

reviews.title: Awesome Upgrade!
reviews.comment: I updated a while back but hadn\'t played till now. Love the levels and creatures. Also new variety of weapons makes for more interesting game play. Great job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is what we need
reviews.comment: No stupid gimmicks or fake cartoony ploy, no crap graphics,  THIS... is what we need.  A good game, something with replay value and difficulty.  No gimmicks, perfect
reviews.author: John Ross

reviews.title: Best free game I\'ve played
reviews.comment: If you want smooth game play action and something that\'s not hounding you or forcing y ou to buy something this is the game for you. Simple, fun, challenging and well made. GREAT JOB DEVELOPERS! wish I could give it ten stars. ;)
reviews.author: jason brown

reviews.title: Evo lte, viper 3.16 rom, S-off
reviews.comment: Really fun, 100% free, none of that pay to win nonsense. Good graphics and decent sounds.
reviews.author: Jim Bice

reviews.title: Very nice game,keep it up guys
reviews.comment: Great graphics, addictive game and very challenging beside that no trouble shooting occurs,i love it
reviews.author: Hossam Amin

reviews.title: Fun twist  on the defense style game
reviews.comment: Great defense style game! Better feel because there it\'s no set path, things coming at you, need to keep things balanced, space theme is great!
reviews.author: ant nate

reviews.title: Awesome! Addictive!
reviews.comment: For mature individuals who loves a challenge. Like a space chess/ strategic game. I would LOVE for the developer to create more sophisticated weapons, exotic multiple enemies, ships or visiting allies, extreme detailed damage, elimination of the mundane. This game has so much potential to become more that needs to be seen that would dwarf these new mindless unworthy apps!
reviews.author: Adrian Blackman

reviews.title: Simple, fun, fast.
reviews.comment: I played survival mode for like two hours straight, my eyes hurt. It\'s a simple concept, build, repair, upgrade, survive.  Graphics are fun, controls are almost great, game play is addicting. Thanks!
reviews.author: Dan Burkard

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Gets impossible after high waves. But still out of this world
reviews.author: Matthias Kistler

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Decent graphics and fun to play through on normal. Got pretty easy after awhile, but still a fun game. Bonus star for being free without obtrusive ads or IAP.
reviews.author: Matthew Goff

reviews.title: Galx.2
reviews.comment: Great game easy to play. Works well make your battle plans.
reviews.author: Daniel J. Landry

reviews.title: Glitch
reviews.comment: Campaign mode has a glitch that doesn\'t allow you to exit out an level that you have already beaten. It is a very fun game, but I can\'t even play further due to the glitch!
reviews.author: Cameron Miller

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great game please keep working and add more levels and weapons to make it more challenging and I\'m almost to level 300.
reviews.author: Anthony Dlugolinski

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Great tower defence.
reviews.author: Luke Davidson

reviews.title: Fun especially for toddlers
reviews.comment: After the Russian meteor blast and asteroid flyby near the Earth happening on the same day, this game can make you think that we need to flow funds toward protecting the Earth.
reviews.author: Gina A

reviews.comment: I love its fun
reviews.author: Brenda Johnson

reviews.title: Love it so far.
reviews.comment: Only downloaded it half hour ago but already loving it. Well done guys!
reviews.author: Mike Potter

reviews.comment: Fun game..but i have nothing to do after finished all difficulties level..update please
reviews.author: A Google User
